title: WTB: N172 Minneapolis, Scrapps Comiskey, Mayo Boston's
author: daniel.1983

posts.post_title: WTB: N172 Minneapolis, Scrapps Comiskey, Mayo Boston's
posts.post_content:
19th century cards I'd like to add to my collection:
N172 Minneapolis player
1888 Scrapps Comiskey
1895 Mayo Boston players (I have Duffy, Ganzel and Bannon already)

Probably looking for cards in Authentic to Fair condition to help keep costs lower.

I’m planning to have it graded, but I suppose if the price were right I might skip that step. I honestly don’t know what I would ask for it graded or not. I expect it would grade in the range from authentic to 1.5. I just got it today, but I was planning to do some research to find out more about the set, values, etc. That’s what I was doing when I found your post.

Thanks for your message. I have since acquired a Comiskey so would likely pass but you could send me a photo if you'd like in case I were to decide to upgrade.

Still searching for other N172 Minneapolis and N300 Boston players.

posts.post_title: Re: WTB: N172 Minneapolis, Scrapps Comiskey, Mayo Boston's
posts.post_content: Have a couple Minneapolis subjects here: [url]https://t206.monkberry.com/19thcentury.html[/url]
